All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveState
The ActiveState class represents the active state of a racer.
AerialArena
Aerial type Arena class
AerialRacer
The aerial racers interface
Airplane
Airplane type racer class
Arena
The general Arena type abstract class, used to store arena details for specific kinds of arenas.
ArenaBuilder
The ArenaBuilder class is a builder class for creating instances of the Arena class using the builder pattern.
ArenaFactory
The ArenaFactory class is responsible for dynamically creating instances of the Arena class based on the provided arena type.
ArenaPlan
 
Bicycle
Bicycle type racer class
BrokenState
The BrokenState class represents the broken state of a racer.
Car
Car type racer class
CompletedState
The CompletedState class represents the completed state of a racer.
DisabledState
The DisabledState class represents the disabled state of a racer.
EnumContainer
Contains all Enums for the game.

EnumContainer.Wind
 
Fate
 
GameControl
The GameControl class represents a JPanel that serves as the control panel for a racing game.
GameWindow
The GameWindow class represents the main game window.
Helicopter
Helicopter type racer class
Horse
Horse type racer class
LandArena
Land type Arena class
LandRacer
The land racers interface
Mishap
Mishap class
NavalArena
Naval type Arena class
NavalRacer
The naval racers interface
Point
A 2D point class to determine arena sizes and player locations on the grid
Program
 
RaceBuilder
The Race builder class as a Singleton object
Racer
The general Racer type abstract class, used to store racer details for specific Racer types.
RacerAlertState
The RacerAlertState interface represents the state of a racer in relation to an alert.
racerIcon
The racerIcon class is a JPanel that displays a racer's icon.
RacerLimitException
 
RacerState
The RacerState class represents the state of a racer and provides methods for managing and alerting the state.
RacerTypeException
 
RowBoat
RowBoat type racer class
SpeedBoat
SpeedBoat type racer class
Wheeled
Wheeled class
